optionsTitle.message: Talis Aspire Reading Lists Bookmarking Options

optionsOtherOptionLabel.description: Manually specify tenant short code option

optionsRegionLabel.description: Manually specify region for the given tenant short code option

optionsRegionCALabel.description: This option sets the region to CA

optionsShortCodeLabel.description: Manually add tenant by short code input label

noTenantAlert.description: Alert presented if no institution has been set

noTenantRegionAlert.message: When selecting Other you must specify a region
